Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: This very long necklace is composed of eight hundred small disc-shaped beads made from bone. Each bead has an average diametre of 0,45 cm and a thickness of 0,2 cm. The opening of each piece is about 0,1 cm in diametre. Remains of the thread unifying this set of beads still exist. It was either of leather or of an organic matter.
